Version 2.0.64 - Fix Backward Navigation & Faster Detection

Bug Fixes

  • Fix backward navigation not updating position bar (e.g. slide 2â†’1 stayed at 2/5)
  • Fix tag navigation failing because SmartLearning thought user was at wrong slide
  • Speed up generic total slides detection (was ~6.5s, now ~2.3s)

Changes

  • LMSSetValue writes to lesson_location now pass as directSlide (authoritative, allows backward)
  • Only poll-based reads suppress backward movement (stale data protection)
  • Generic detection start delay reduced from 5000ms to 1500ms, interval from 1500ms to 800ms
  • Same fix applied to both SCORM 1.2 (cmi.core.lesson_location) and SCORM 2004 (cmi.location)

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.63: Fix false 100% completion, totalSlides=0 for unknown totals
  • v2.0.62: DOM-based total slides, suppress false 100%, fix initial dip
